text: The Big Clock is a 1948 American thriller movie directed by John Farrow and was based on the 1946 novel of the same name by Kenneth Fearing. It stars Ray Millard, Charles Laughton, Harry Morgan, Elsa Lanchester, Rita Johnson, Dan Tobin, Elaine Riley and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was remade in 1976 as Police Python 357 and again in 1987 as No Way Out. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1948 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Farrow Category:Movies set in New York City
